data.title: Southfield Road, 11 Mile Road to 12 Mile Road-COMPLETE
data.meta_description: Southfield Road, 11 Mile Road to 12 Mile Road in Lathrup Village, will be resurfaced in 2024. Work on utilities and tree removals will begin late in 2023 and go into early 2024. During the resurfacing work, Southfield Road will have one lane open in each direction. There will be closures of 11 Mile and 12 Mile roads at Southfield Road during separate intervals to accommodate construction activities.
data.text:
TRAFFIC IMPACTS:

STAGE 1 (approximately three weeks)

STARTING MAY 3 MAY 6 -MAY 20:

One lane of Southfield Road in each direction and the center left-turn lane will be open between 11 Mile Road and 12 Mile Road.

Both eastbound and westbound I-696 ramps at Southfield Road will close.

Eastbound I-696 ramp to Southfield Road detour is I-696 to Evergreen Road to 12 Mile Road, back to Southfield Road.

Westbound I-696 ramp to Southfield Road detour is I-696 to Greenfield Road to 10 Mile Road, back to Southfield Road.

11 Mile Road will be closed on the west side of Southfield Road. Westbound 11 Mile Road traffic will only be able to turn left or right at Southfield Road.

The detour route for 11 Mile Road traffic while the west half of the 11 Mile Road/Southfield Road intersection is closed is Greenfield Road to 12 Mile Road to Evergreen Road to 10 Mile Road, back to Southfield Road.

The detour for Southfield Road traffic wishing to travel west on 11 Mile Road is Southfield Road to either 10 Mile Road or 12 Mile Road to Evergreen Road, back to 11 Mile Road.

STAGE 2 (approximately three weeks)

STARTING MAY 20-JUNE 10 4:

One lane in each direction will be open on Southfield Road between 11 Mile Road and 12 Mile Road.

The westbound I-696 ramp to Southfield Road will remain closed.

Westbound I-696 ramp to Southfield Road detour is I-696 to Greenfield Road to 10 Mile Road, back to Southfield Road.

11 Mile Road will be closed on the east side of Southfield Road. Eastbound 11 Mile Road traffic will only be able to turn right or left at Southfield Road.

The detour for 11 Mile Road traffic while the east half of the 11 Mile Road/Southfield Road intersection is closed is Greenfield Road to 12 Mile Road to Evergreen Road to 10 Mile Road, back to Southfield Road.

The detour for Southfield Road traffic wishing to travel east on 11 Mile Road is Southfield Road to either 10 Mile Road or 12 Mile Road to Greenfield Road, back to 11 Mile Road.

12 MILE ROAD AT SOUTHFIELD ROAD WEEKEND CLOSURES (the work is weather-dependent):

12 Mile Road approaches to Southfield Road are expected to close for paving work on the following weekends:

June 7 at 7:00 p.m. through the evening of June 9 (updated)

Saturday, June 15, through Sunday, June 16. (updated)

During the work, northbound and southbound Southfield Road will remain open to traffic; however, Southfield Road traffic will be unable to turn onto 12 Mile Road.
